• Twitter
  • Github
  • LinkedIn
  • RSS

Content Security Policy

Open up the possibility to instruct the client browser from which location and/or which type of resources are allowed to be loaded, providing a directive that loads a behavior for a target resource type.

_journey/security/embedded-malicious-code/content-security-policy.md
